content:
TITLE: Cloning and Setting Up ElevenLabs MCP Development Environment
DESCRIPTION: Series of bash commands to clone the ElevenLabs MCP repository, create a virtual environment, install dependencies, and configure the development environment with an API key.
SOURCE: https://github.com/elevenlabs/elevenlabs-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/elevenlabs/elevenlabs-mcp
cd elevenlabs-mcp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Python Environment with UV Package Manager
DESCRIPTION: Bash commands for creating a virtual environment, activating it, and installing development dependencies using the UV package manager, which is the recommended approach for this project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/elevenlabs/elevenlabs-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
uv venv
source .venv/bin/activate
uv pip install -e ".[dev]"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Claude Desktop for ElevenLabs MCP
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for adding the ElevenLabs MCP server to Claude Desktop. This setup uses the 'uvx' package manager to run the server and requires your ElevenLabs API key as an environment variable.
SOURCE: https://github.com/elevenlabs/elevenlabs-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "ElevenLabs": {
      "command": "uvx",
      "args": ["elevenlabs-mcp"],
      "env": {
        "ELEVENLABS_API_KEY": "<insert-your-api-key-here>"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Copying Environment Configuration File
DESCRIPTION: Command to copy the example environment file to a .env file where developers can add their ElevenLabs API key for local development and testing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/elevenlabs/elevenlabs-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cp .env.example .env
# Edit .env and add your API key
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing and Debugging MCP Server
DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing the ElevenLabs MCP server in Claude Desktop and testing it locally with the MCP Inspector development tool.
SOURCE: https://github.com/elevenlabs/elevenlabs-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
mcp install elevenlabs_mcp/server.py

mcp dev elevenlabs_mcp/server.py
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Test Suite for ElevenLabs MCP
DESCRIPTION: Commands to run the test suite to verify the ElevenLabs MCP server is functioning correctly, with options for verbose output and fast failure.
SOURCE: https://github.com/elevenlabs/elevenlabs-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./scripts/test.sh
# Or with options
./scripts/test.sh --verbose --fail-fast
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Finding MCP Server Executable Path
DESCRIPTION: Bash command to locate the absolute path of the uvx executable, which is useful for troubleshooting when Claude Desktop cannot find the executable in its PATH.
SOURCE: https://github.com/elevenlabs/elevenlabs-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
which uvx
```
